creator: FunVenture
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to the Miners settlement! It's one of the nostalgic mining and crafting games in which you will fall in love with from the very beginning!

This is easy to play and relaxing town builder in which you start by exploring the story behind a small village from the valley.
Once a day this was a well prosperous small miners village, but then the tragic happened, and the whole town was destroyed. The main town builder has left the valley, leaving it on its own. The main artefact of the settlement, "heart of the mountain", is lost.

Will you be the one to make this valley see life again?

Exploring the mine will help you to gather new resources and will unlock new pets able to help the village. Mining and crafting games require a lot of time and grinding. That's why as a pets keeper you need to train your animals to help you with grinding.
These are a blessing for the valley, they will automatically gather required materials in an idle games way, so you won't need to do anything.

Key game values:
- ⚒️ One of the most appealing mining and crafting games experience.
- 🏗️Easy to play town builder mechanics.
- 🐌You will become the best pets keeper ever!
- 🏡Relax and start exploring the valley story!
- ⌛ Feed the animals and automate things like in idle games!

Create your very own unique pixel character, get back to nature and begin exploring the valley right away!
descriptionShort: ⛏️Mining and crafting game with town builder mechanics🏗️ Explore the valley!

- New Quests

creator: FunVenture - Idle Clicker Games
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to the Idle Miners settlement! It's a nostalgic clicker game in which you will fall in love with from the very beginning!

Key features of the game:
🗺️ An open tiny miners world to be explored
🏡 Nice story-driven quests behind a tiny miners village
🤑 Dozens of materials to gather and sell for money
🤖 In-game auto clicker robot for a better experience
⚒️ Most appealing mining and crafting games experience.
🏗️Easy to play town building mechanics.
🐌Offline income taken from the best idle games
⌛Tame your own pet friend

This is easy to play and relaxing village building clicker game in which you start by exploring the story behind a tiny miners village.
Once a day this was a well prosperous tiny miners settlement, but then the tragic happened, and the whole village was destroyed. The main town builder has left the valley, leaving it on its own. The main artefact of the settlement, "heart of the mountain", is lost.

Will you be the one to make this village see life again?

Exploring the mine will help you to gather new resources and will unlock new pets able to help the village. Clicker games require a lot of time and grinding. That's why as a pets keeper you need to train your pets to help you with grinding. They will make the clicker game more idle game for you. Pets are a blessing for the village, they will automatically gather required materials in an idle games way, so you won't need to do anything.

Create your very own unique pixel character, get back to nature and begin exploring the village right away!
Don't wait anymore and try this fresh clicker game right now!
descriptionShort: Mine the minerals, craft tools and unravel immersive story in idle clicker game.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Game redesigned from scratch!
Doesn't require an internet connection anymore.
There is no more need to feed pets.
Pets work offline for 6 next hours!
Fix to not working video ads
Screen will not go off when collecting minerals.
No more annoying reward popup when collecting minerals.

title: Idle Miners Settlement: idle mining & clicker game

creator: FunVenture - Idle Clicker Games
descriptionHtml:
Dive into a tiny open-world placed in a small miners settlement and unravel the immersive story behind their village.

Mine the materials, trade, and craft new equipment. Fight with dangerous enemies in classic RPG battles. Explore the deepest mine and its mysteries. Finally, help the villagers to get life back into the village.

Don't wait anymore and try out this nostalgic and fresh RPG idle clicker game.

The most important features:
🗺️ Open world.

🤏 Immersive idle clicker game mechanics.
🎒 Equipment system based on the best RPGs.
🤖 Built-in auto clicker.
📜 Dozens of quests to be completed.

Are you still not convinced? Or maybe you didn't try idle clicker games yet? No worries! You can try it for free!

Mine the materials, trade, and craft new equipment. Fight with dangerous enemies in classic RPG battles. Explore the deepest mine and its mysteries. Finally, help the villagers to get life back into the village.

Don't wait anymore and try out this nostalgic and fresh RPG idle clicker game.

The most important features:
🗺️ Open world.
🏡 A true storyline behind the game.
⚖️ Trade materials and get profits.
⚒️ Idle offline materials mining.
⚔️ Classical old-school RPG battles.
🤏 Immersive idle clicker game mechanics.
🎒 Equipment system based on the best RPGs.
🤖 Built-in auto clicker.
📜 Dozens of quests to be completed.

Are you still not convinced? Or maybe you didn't try idle clicker games yet? No worries! You can try it for free!

title: Idle Miners Settlement: Mine, Craft, Fight

creator: FunVenture - Idle Clicker Games
descriptionHtml:
Miners Settlement: Idle RPG is a clicker game which will take you on an open-world adventure full of fantastical creatures. Go on a mighty quest to craft equipment, mine for materials and fight enemies in classic RPG battles!

The open world is placed in a small miners settlement and it’s up to you to unravel the immersive story behind their village. Help the villagers through trading materials, mining and crafting. Complete epic quests and explore the progressive storyline of this idle clicker game!

Key Features of Miners Settlement: Idle RPG

🗺️ Open world.
Immersive open world you will have endless fun exploring! Uncover the mysteries of the mine, face the horrors of the dungeons and explore over 60 tower floors!

🏡 A true storyline behind the game.
Constant story and character progression! Rebuild your village and meet various friends and foes throughout the open-world storyline.

⚖️ Trade materials and get profits.
You’ve got some extra resources you’re not sure what to do with? Trade your free idle materials for needed assets and profits!

⚔️ Classical old-school RPG battles.
Miners Settlement: Idle RPG has an enjoyable fighting mechanism with classic turn based combat! Fight various creatures such as trolls, goblins and even the fearsome Necromancer!

🤏 Immersive idle clicker game mechanics.
Lose yourself in the open-world idle story with addictive clicker mechanics!
Gather resources, craft a broad variety of equipment and upgrade your character as the story progresses.

🤖 Built-in auto clicker.
Tired of clicking? Activate the auto clicker and collect materials even when you’re away from your phone!

📜 Dozens of quests to be completed.
Complete one mighty quest after another! Set off on an open-world adventure and become a hero!

Do you enjoy idle clicker games? Download Miners Settlement: Idle RPG and enjoy the open-world pixel game with its immersive storyline!


Official website: http://www.funventure.eu
descriptionShort: Immersive Open-world Idle RPG Simulation - Mine, Craft, Fight and Become a Hero!

Key Features of Miners Settlement: Idle RPG

🗺️ Open world.
Immersive open world you will have endless fun exploring! Uncover the mysteries of the mine, face the horrors of the dungeons and explore over 60 tower floors!

🏡 A true storyline behind the game.
Constant story and character progression! Rebuild your village and meet various friends and foes throughout the open-world storyline.

⚖️ Trade materials and get profits.
You’ve got some extra resources you’re not sure what to do with? Trade your free idle materials for needed assets and profits!

⚔️ Classical old-school RPG battles.
Miners Settlement: Idle RPG has an enjoyable fighting mechanism with classic turn based combat! Fight various creatures such as trolls, goblins and even the fearsome Necromancer!

🤏 Immersive idle clicker game mechanics.
Lose yourself in the open-world idle story with addictive clicker mechanics!
Gather resources, craft a broad variety of equipment and upgrade your character as the story progresses.

🤖 Built-in auto clicker.
Tired of clicking? Activate the auto clicker and collect materials even when you’re away from your phone!

📜 Dozens of quests to be completed.
Complete one mighty quest after another! Set off on an open-world adventure and become a hero!

Do you enjoy idle clicker games? Download Miners Settlement: Idle RPG and enjoy the open-world pixel game with its immersive storyline!


Official website: http://www.funventure.eu

The open world is placed in a small miners settlement and it’s up to you to unravel the immersive story behind their village. Help the villagers through trading materials, mining and crafting. Complete epic quests and explore the progressive storyline of this idle clicker game!

Key Features of Miners Settlement: Idle RPG

🗺️ Open world.
Immersive open world you will have endless fun exploring! Uncover the mysteries of the mine, face the horrors of the dungeons and explore over 60 tower floors!

🏡 A true storyline behind the game.
Constant story and character progression! Rebuild your village and meet various friends and foes throughout the open-world storyline.

⚖️ Trade materials and get profits.
You’ve got some extra resources you’re not sure what to do with? Trade your free idle materials for needed assets and profits!

⚔️ Classical old-school RPG battles.
Miners Settlement: Idle RPG has an enjoyable fighting mechanism with classic turn based combat! Fight various creatures such as trolls, goblins and even the fearsome Necromancer!

🤏 Immersive idle clicker game mechanics.
Lose yourself in the open-world idle story with addictive clicker mechanics!
Gather resources, craft a broad variety of equipment and upgrade your character as the story progresses.

🤖 Built-in auto clicker.
Tired of clicking? Activate the auto clicker and collect materials even when you’re away from your phone!

📜 Dozens of quests to be completed.
Complete one mighty quest after another! Set off on an open-world adventure and become a hero!

Do you enjoy idle clicker games? Download Miners Settlement: Idle RPG and enjoy the open-world pixel game with its immersive storyline!


Official website: http://www.funventure.eu
descriptionShort: Immersive Open-world Idle RPG Simulation - Mine, Craft, Fight and Become a Hero!

title: Miners Settlement: Idle RPG

creator: FunVenture - Idle Clicker Games
descriptionHtml:
Miners Settlement: Idle RPG is a clicker game which will take you on an open-world adventure full of fantastical creatures. Go on a mighty quest to craft equipment, mine for materials and fight enemies in classic RPG battles!

The open world is placed in a small miners settlement and it’s up to you to unravel the immersive story behind their village. Help the villagers through trading materials, mining and crafting. Complete epic quests and explore the progressive storyline of this idle clicker game!

Key Features of Miners Settlement: Idle RPG

🗺️ Open world.
Immersive open world you will have endless fun exploring! Uncover the mysteries of the mine, face the horrors of the dungeons and explore over 60 tower floors!

🏡 A true storyline behind the game.
Constant story and character progression! Rebuild your village and meet various friends and foes throughout the open-world storyline.

⚖️ Trade materials and get profits.
You’ve got some extra resources you’re not sure what to do with? Trade your free idle materials for needed assets and profits!

⚔️ Classical old-school RPG battles.
Miners Settlement: Idle RPG has an enjoyable fighting mechanism with classic turn based combat! Fight various creatures such as trolls, goblins and even the fearsome Necromancer!

🤏 Immersive idle clicker game mechanics.
Lose yourself in the open-world idle story with addictive clicker mechanics!
Gather resources, craft a broad variety of equipment and upgrade your character as the story progresses.

🤖 Built-in auto clicker.
Tired of clicking? Activate the auto clicker and collect materials even when you’re away from your phone!

📜 Dozens of quests to be completed.
Complete one mighty quest after another! Set off on an open-world adventure and become a hero!

Do you enjoy idle clicker games? Download Miners Settlement: Idle RPG and enjoy the open-world pixel game with its immersive storyline!


Official website: http://www.funventure.eu
descriptionShort: Immersive Open-world Idle RPG Simulation - Mine, Craft, Fight and Become a Hero!

Miners Settlement: Idle RPG is a clicker game which will take you on an open-world adventure full of fantastical creatures. Go on a mighty quest to craft equipment, mine for materials and fight enemies in classic RPG battles!

The open world is placed in a small miners settlement and it’s up to you to unravel the immersive story behind their village. Help the villagers through trading materials, mining and crafting. Complete epic quests and explore the progressive storyline of this idle clicker game!

Key Features of Miners Settlement: Idle RPG

🗺️ Open world.
Immersive open world you will have endless fun exploring! Uncover the mysteries of the mine, face the horrors of the dungeons and explore over 60 tower floors!

🏡 A true storyline behind the game.
Constant story and character progression! Rebuild your village and meet various friends and foes throughout the open-world storyline.

⚖️ Trade materials and get profits.
You’ve got some extra resources you’re not sure what to do with? Trade your free idle materials for needed assets and profits!

⚔️ Classical old-school RPG battles.
Miners Settlement: Idle RPG has an enjoyable fighting mechanism with classic turn based combat! Fight various creatures such as trolls, goblins and even the fearsome Necromancer!

🤏 Immersive idle clicker game mechanics.
Lose yourself in the open-world idle story with addictive clicker mechanics!
Gather resources, craft a broad variety of equipment and upgrade your character as the story progresses.

🤖 Built-in auto clicker.
Tired of clicking? Activate the auto clicker and collect materials even when you’re away from your phone!

📜 Dozens of quests to be completed.
Complete one mighty quest after another! Set off on an open-world adventure and become a hero!

Do you enjoy idle clicker games? Download Miners Settlement: Idle RPG and enjoy the open-world pixel game with its immersive storyline!


Official website: http://www.funventure.eu
descriptionShort: Immersive Open-world Idle RPG Simulation - Mine, Craft, Fight and Become a Hero!

title:
Miners Settlement: Idle RPG
4.20.11

creator: Funventure P.S.A.
descriptionHtml:
Miners Settlement: Idle RPG is a clicker game which will take you on an open-world adventure full of fantastical creatures. Go on a mighty quest to craft equipment, mine for materials and fight enemies in classic RPG battles!

The open world is placed in a small miners settlement and it’s up to you to unravel the immersive story behind their village. Help the villagers through trading materials, mining and crafting. Complete epic quests and explore the progressive storyline of this idle clicker game!

Key Features of Miners Settlement: Idle RPG

🗺️ Open world.
Immersive open world you will have endless fun exploring! Uncover the mysteries of the mine, face the horrors of the dungeons and explore over 60 tower floors!

🏡 A true storyline behind the game.
Constant story and character progression! Rebuild your village and meet various friends and foes throughout the open-world storyline.

⚖️ Trade materials and get profits.
You’ve got some extra resources you’re not sure what to do with? Trade your free idle materials for needed assets and profits!

⚔️ Classical old-school RPG battles.
Miners Settlement: Idle RPG has an enjoyable fighting mechanism with classic turn based combat! Fight various creatures such as trolls, goblins and even the fearsome Necromancer!

🤏 Immersive idle clicker game mechanics.
Lose yourself in the open-world idle story with addictive clicker mechanics!
Gather resources, craft a broad variety of equipment and upgrade your character as the story progresses.

🤖 Built-in auto clicker.
Tired of clicking? Activate the auto clicker and collect materials even when you’re away from your phone!

📜 Dozens of quests to be completed.
Complete one mighty quest after another! Set off on an open-world adventure and become a hero!

Do you enjoy idle clicker games? Download Miners Settlement: Idle RPG and enjoy the open-world pixel game with its immersive storyline!


Official website: http://www.funventure.eu
descriptionShort: Immersive Open-world Idle RPG Simulation - Mine, Craft, Fight and Become a Hero!

The open world is placed in a small miners settlement and it’s up to you to unravel the immersive story behind their village. Help the villagers through trading materials, mining and crafting. Complete epic quests and explore the progressive storyline of this idle clicker game!

Key Features of Miners Settlement: Idle RPG

🗺️ Open world.
Immersive open world you will have endless fun exploring! Uncover the mysteries of the mine, face the horrors of the dungeons and explore over 60 tower floors!

🏡 A true storyline behind the game.
Constant story and character progression! Rebuild your village and meet various friends and foes throughout the open-world storyline.

⚖️ Trade materials and get profits.
You’ve got some extra resources you’re not sure what to do with? Trade your free idle materials for needed assets and profits!

⚔️ Classical old-school RPG battles.
Miners Settlement: Idle RPG has an enjoyable fighting mechanism with classic turn based combat! Fight various creatures such as trolls, goblins and even the fearsome Necromancer!

🤏 Immersive idle clicker game mechanics.
Lose yourself in the open-world idle story with addictive clicker mechanics!
Gather resources, craft a broad variety of equipment and upgrade your character as the story progresses.

🤖 Built-in auto clicker.
Tired of clicking? Activate the auto clicker and collect materials even when you’re away from your phone!

📜 Dozens of quests to be completed.
Complete one mighty quest after another! Set off on an open-world adventure and become a hero!

Do you enjoy idle clicker games? Download Miners Settlement: Idle RPG and enjoy the open-world pixel game with its immersive storyline!


Official website: http://www.funventure.eu
descriptionShort: Immersive Open-world Idle RPG Simulation - Mine, Craft, Fight and Become a Hero!

descriptionHtml:
Miners Settlement: Idle RPG – A Relaxing Pixel Adventure

Miners Settlement is a nostalgic idle RPG and clicker game where you mine, build, fight, and explore a relaxing pixel world full of story, quests, battles, and adventure. It's the perfect idle RPG for fans of resource management, automation, and retro pixel graphics, and an excellent time killer for casual players looking for an easy idle RPG mining game with AFK progress.

⚒️ Mine, Click, Automate
Tap to gather resources, mine valuable ores, upgrade your tools, and unlock auto-mining and automation systems. Whether you're online or offline, your helpers keep working for you. Progress steadily in a world of casual, idle RPG, and AFK gameplay that's easy to pick up and play. This idle RPG pixel game provides a relaxing experience, perfect for fans of idle gameplay with simple mechanics.

📜 Discover the Story and Complete Quests
You're not just clicking—you're taking part in a story-rich idle RPG. Complete a variety of quests, help rebuild your hometown, and interact with quirky characters in a forgotten pixel world. Every quest moves you forward in the world of Miners Settlement, with easy-to-pick-up gameplay perfect for casual players.

⚔️ Idle Battles, AFK Fights, and Combat Challenges
Enter idle RPG battles where your hero fights enemies and collects loot automatically in clicker-style combat. Prepare your character, equip better gear, and grind through dangerous foes. Whether you play actively or prefer a stress-free, AFK experience, progress never stops. This game is perfect for anyone looking for a relaxing idle RPG offline with auto-mining and easy resource management.

🏗️ Rebuild and Upgrade Your Settlement
Start with a crumbling village and restore it into a thriving community. Build structures, upgrade your facilities, and unlock new gameplay systems with each improvement. Your settlement is the heart of your casual adventure.

🛒 Trade, Battle Loot, and Manage Resources
Collect rare resources and use the trading system to exchange items, sell battle rewards, earn gold, and optimize your inventory. Smart resource management helps you progress efficiently while keeping gameplay simple and satisfying. Whether you're looking for a relaxing idle RPG with resource trading or automated progression, Miners Settlement is your go-to.

👥 Join a Guild
Connect with other players by joining a guild. Work together on community goals and climb guild leaderboards. Whether you're a casual miner or a dedicated grinder, teamwork makes the journey even better.

🌟 Why You'll Love Miners Settlement:
- Deep idle RPG gameplay with full offline progress
- Charming pixel art and nostalgic retro vibe
- Dozens of quests, simple mechanics, and a rich storyline
- Relaxed RPG progression and character development
- Engaging idle RPG battles with auto-combat
- Strategic resource trading and inventory management
- A growing settlement that evolves over time
- Guild system and social features
- The ultimate idle RPG to play casually, stress-free, and at your own pace

💎 Perfect for Fans of:
Idle RPG, idle miner, AFK games, clicker games, quest-based RPGs, pixel games, relaxing games, retro idle adventures, idle battles, and resource trading.
Whether you're in it for the chill idle grind, the pixel RPG atmosphere, or the relaxing quest progression, Miners Settlement is your next favorite idle RPG and perfect time killer. It’s an easy idle mining game with automated features, perfect for those seeking stress-free progression.
Download now and enjoy a relaxing adventure anytime!

Official website: http://www.funventure.eu
